title: Is Kayn supposed to get hit by AOEs and other effects while ulted?
body:
I noticed I've been dying while in his ult fairly often. It seems like ground effects and auras, possibly other stuff as well still hurt him. I think giving him actual invulnerability while ulted would help a lot. I think I've been killed while inside someone like 4 or 5 times today. 

Also buff shadow form's damage. Maybe allow him to keep moving while he does Q? The pause for the spin feels weird since he's all about speed in assassin mode.

replies.body: Tethers, DoTs, and other similar effects can still hurt you (like Zed ult). Normal AoE can't hurt you.
but when using  R -Leech and gain** untargetable  effect **and a morg or fidd can ult and u get damaged while already **untargetable in ult status**, that's when its a bug, and needs to be reported
Morg ult is a tether so it should still stun you, Fiddle ult shouldnt hurt when you ult him. If it does its a bug I guess but I dont think it does.
I agree stun shld happen, but not damage on tether Morg ult
Tethers still hit.  That's just the rule, it's true of Fizz and Vladimir too.  Otherwise they'd be even more annoying than they are now.
hmmm ok, I'll accept it
Amumu can cry you to death while in ult.
True sadness cannot be defended against.

Interesting, Illaoi coould still damage me further when I ulted her with {{champion:141}} I had my full hp, i ulted her, and then suddenly I took all the damage from her.... {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Interactions with Illaoi ult seems to kill me. Died 4 times in ult today and no DoT that I could see in my death report, but seems like something to do with illaoi was killing me
I have seen a lot of Kayn players die to deaths dance as they ult. It's pretty funny since they think there is no possible way to die when u ulted
He was in Alpha {{champion:11}}

i dont think he needs any damage buffs
the q thing is pretty annoying tho

His Ult states he is Untargetable, meaning he cannot be damaged directly by procs and Spells and Autoattacks. HOWEVER What you probably Keep dying from is Debuffs and DoT's.

Ignite and a Zed R and Fizz W Passive are the 3 best examples, followed up by GP Passive and Fiddle drain, and also including Burn damages and Deathfire Touch and Redbuff Ticks and redsmite ticks.
You Can still die while ulting, but it is situational. You Probably got whacked by Redbuffs and Redsmites and ignites a lot without noticing it.
Watching Fiddle stand there draining himself is actually kinda funny

that it is XD i got the pleasure to watch it, and it just looks like he is spreading his arms out and shaking as if he is trying to Imitate a saiyan, all it is missing is the scream that would last for 2-3 games LMAO
Had this happen to me today. Died to blitzcrank E while in ult twice. Yes you read that right his E the powered auto attack, he auto'd me while i was in ult twice. No DoTs on enemy team.
So im not crazy the veigar w was killing me multiple times while i was ulting

I think the shadow forms damage is in the W so I think he needs a bit more experimentation before dishing out mass buffs or anything.

And about the ult I think DOT attacks still affect him after he ults so it could be that. I never got hit by anything while ulting so it could just be a conditional bug.
This happened to me in my last kayn game. I got killed by Vi's E's AOE during my ult.

I tested it in training mode, sometimes when you ult a enemy and you're already gone a tower hit will still damage you, before the tower shot arrived at my champion I was already untargetabble yet still got damaged half a second later meaning the tower shot hit me while in ult form, that means it could happen to abilities and AA's as well which would explain how you and others keep dying while in ult.

it seems that if you ult a half a second before the tower shoot it will still hit and damage you even though you're already untergetabble

Yeah I've definitely noticed this too. It doesn't seem to work exactly like fizz or vlad's untargetable states.
I think I've died from tower shots on TT...
i have been hit by tower in my ulti a few times

AoE not, damage over time absolutely. Building Death's Dance will also inrease the frequency of this happening. 

I would have an interesting suggestion though that would make Kayn more unique but also overpowered. When he ults and infests a champion just let him pass all debuffs, CC or DoT's to the infested target. So if you build deaths dance, the target you ult starts bleeding. If you get ignited, exhausted, slowed, blinded it also affects your ult target instead of you while you are inside them. I think this would make him hilarious and create a lot of rants on the board. The amount of rants is usually a good indicator for champion being good . lel
